hasBeenAimed(ICellEvent) - Method in class fr.univlille.iutinfo.strategy.RandomHunterStrategy

Hunter - Class in fr.univlille.iutinfo.game
The Hunter class is a subclass of Player that represents a hunter in a game.

hunterAI - Static variable in class fr.univlille.iutinfo.view.MazeView
The boolean representing if the hunter is AI
hunterloop() - Method in class fr.univlille.iutinfo.game.Game
This method lauches the hunter AI loop or the hunter player loop depending on the hunterAI flag.
